fields.description:
Description of the issue:
==================
In Radio screen title is missing for the Radio channels which are having event information
 

Environment details:
=============== 
NL - Pre PROD
00.02-086-fi
Head-end: 4.23
CPE ID :  3C36E4-EOSSTB-003843243308

Scenario to reproduce:
=================
1. Launch Menu
2. Press OK on Radio Portal tile

Reproducibility rate:
==============
5/5

Expected result:
============

Title should be displayed below each Radio Channel tile which are having event information.

Actual results:

===========

Missing title below the Radio Channel tiles which are having event information
fields.summary: [PREPROD NL] Missing title for Radio Channels in Radio Screen

fields.description:
Description of the issue:
==================

Replay playback is failing with CS2517 error code after rebooting the CPE

Environment details:
=============== 
IE - Pre PROD
00.02-086-fi
Head-end: 4.23
CPE ID :  000378-EOSSTB-003798149005

Scenario to reproduce:
=================

  1. Navigate to MENU=>TV GUIDE
  2. Perform replay playback on channels 116

Event Details:  UEFA Europa League Update (February 20, 2020 6:00:00 PM  -  February 20, 2020 6:30:00 PM)

Expected result:
============

Replay playback Should work without any errors

Actual results:

===========

Replay playback is failing with CS2517 error pop-up

Additional Details:
============
http://odh.ecx.lgi.io/kibana6/goto/73877b049f907e1ab0419f93cdebf68c

DVRAS recording playback is failing with CS2218 Error code intermittently.

2/10

NL Prod
79-fw
3C36E4-EOSSTB-003637806807

  • Navigate to MENu => SAVED => RECORDINGS => Recorded

http://odh.ecx.lgi.io/kibana6/goto/66e5e5a171165328152d4ef6c37be2e4

Recording playback should be smooth without any error pop-ups

6. Actual Results

fields.description:
1. Description of the issue: Channel Icons and event metadata are missing from TV Guide

2. Environment details:
R4.23 086-fi

3. Reproducibility: (How often can the issue be reproduced)
100%

4. Preconditions:

5. Steps to reproduce:
1.Navigate to the TV Guide
2. open detail page of any channel

6. Actual results:
1.TV icons are not present in TV Guide
2. event metadata are missing from the detail page

7. Expected Result:
1.TV Icons should be displayed in TV Guide
2. event metadata should present in detail page

fields.description:
Schedule recording icon shown on recording current event

1. Environment details:

  •  Build : 79-FW
  • CPE :  000378-EOSSTB-003799752500
  • PROD GB

2. Scenario to reproduce:

  • Navigate to channel 116 or 165 (Live)
  • Press REC button. Select record episode
  • Validate the recording icon

3. Reproducibility rate: 5/5

4. Expected result: Recording icon should be shown.

5. Actual result: Schedule icon is displayed in channel bar and Planned recording text is displayed in Details page

fields.description:
Description
==========
Special characters like İ, en dash (–) , em dash (—) are not available in virtual keyboard in search
Replay Even title: İstiklal Marşı ve Günün Program Akışı with crid crid:~~2F~~2Fbds.tv~~2F871639852,imi:92beef3f7291eb18f384462b0c8fca0ff2a1b703 in channel with channelId: SV00611 channelName: TRT-TÜRK logical channel number: 800

Replay Even title: CMIM – Erste Runde with crid crid:~~2F~~2Fbds.tv~~2F356572465,imi:e2c30a9a35c54dce05787edfa64c508051f22b84 in channel with channelId: Classica_HD channelName: Stingray Classica HD  logical channel number: 234

Environment Details
==============
AT-PROD
CPE Version : 079-fv
CPE BUILD: mon-ops-00.02-079-fv-AL-20200205065121-na001
Headend: 4.22
CPE ID: 000378-EOSSTB-003771069303

CH-PROD
CPE Version : 079-fv
CPE BUILD: mon-ops-00.02-079-fv-AL-20200205065122-na004
Headend: 4.22
CPE ID: 3C36E4-EOSSTB-003844461800


Steps to Reproduce:
==============
1. Open search from main menu
2. Check whether above mentioned symbols are available in virtual keyboard

Expected Result
============
Character present in virtual keyboard

Actual Result
=========
Character not present in virtual keyboard
fields.summary: [PROD][PREPROD]Replay Event titles have special characters not in virtual keyboard

1. Environment details:
NL - PROD
CPE VERSION: 079-fv

CUSTOMER ID: 9770964_nl

CPE ID : 3C36E4-EOSSTB-003640699405


2. Scenario to reproduce:
      1.Launch Main Menu
      2.Select Saved tab from Main Menu
      3.Select Recordings tab from Saved screen
      4.Select More from Recorded Collection to launch Recording List Page
      5.Navigate to recording asset named 'Drain The Oceans S2, Ep5 - Secrets of New York City'
      6.Open Details Page. 'Series Recording' label is displayed instead of 'Recorded' (attached Screenshot)

Recording-Service Call made : http://recording-service.nl.ecx.lgi.io/customers/9770964_nl/recordings?isAdult=false&offset=0&limit=2147483647&sort=time&sortOrder=asc&profileId=dc49e9dc-61ac-4588-8fc4-935fb1c83dc8&language=en&externalPagination=false

fields.description:
Description
========
All the available channels are getting displayed in TV Guide instead of Personal line up channels, after adding personal lineup channels in already created profile

Environment details:
=============== 
GB - PREPROD
CPE VERSION: 079-FU
CPE BUILD: EOS1008C-mon-ops-00.02-079-fu-AL-20200122074052-na001
Headend: 4.22
CPE ID (GB): 000378-EOSSTB-003798644302

Scenario to reproduce:
=================
Preconditions:
Menu language is set to English.

1. Create a profile without adding any channels and genres
2. Switch to the newly created profile
3. Navigate to Settings and select 'Manage Channels'
4. Add some personal line up channels
5. Launch TV Guide

Expected result:
============
Personal line up channels should be displayed in the TVGuide

Actual result:
===========
All the available channels are getting displayed in the TVGuide

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Note :- Similar issue is seen in channel bar. Here after adding personal line up channels, all available channels are being shown in channel bar instead of personal line up channels.

Scenario to reproduce:
=================
Preconditions:
Menu language is set to English.

1. Create a profile without adding any channels and genres
2. Switch to the newly created profile
3. Navigate to Settings and select 'Manage Channels'
4. Add some personal line up channels
5. Launch Channel bar by pressing channel number 1

Expected result:
============
Personal line up channels should be displayed in Channel bar

Actual result:
===========
All the available channels are getting displayed in Channel bar
fields.summary: [PREPROD GB/BE/AT] All channels are displayed in TV Guide/Channel bar after adding personal line up channels

fields.description:
Description : Intermittently video goes blank and STB get crashed and rebooted after entering into "Netflix" app from search result

[Environment Details]
HE: R4.23
SW Ver: REL-00.02-086-FE

[Steps To Reproduce]
1. Watch any Linear service with AV decoding.
2. Navigate to "Search" option in main menu.
3. Search "Netflix" app and press OK on it.
4. Blank screen is Displayed and STB get crashed and rebooted after pressing any key on remote => Issue


[Actual Behavior]
Video goes blank and STB get crashed and rebooted after entering into "Netflix" app from search result

[Expected Behavior]
Netlix app should open from search result and AV should display.

[Recovery]
None
fields.summary: [Superset]Intermittently video goes blank and STB get crashed and rebooted after entering into "Netflix" app from search result

==========

Actual results

Expected results

CPE should stay in pause mode

Description 
======== 
Replay Playback is failing with CS2512 error code

Environment 
=========== 
Head end : 4.21
Build : 079-FM
GB Prod
Cpe Id : 000378-EOSSTB-003799752500


Reproduction
==========

100%

Steps 
====

  1. Tune to replay enabled channel and initiate playback for a replay asset
    1. Channel: 266, Asset name: Inside: Turkish Airlines

                                                

Actual results 
=========== 
Replay Playback is failing with CS2512 error code

Expected results 
=============
Replay playback must work as expected without fail.

Additional Information:

===============
Kibana Url : http://odh.ecx.lgi.io/kibana6/goto/5a1f23f878b0f5cefa912c87d68bcd50

========

Environment 
===========

Build : 079-FM
GB Prod
Cpe Id : 000378-EOSSTB-003799752500

==========

100%

Steps 
====

  1. Tune to replay enabled channel and initiate playback for a replay asset
    1. Channel: 126, Asset name: Murdoch Mysteries, Traces

Replay Playback is failing with CS2511 error code

fields.description:
Description:
VOD API returns duration as 0 for some of the vod asset.

Environment: PROD NL,CH & BE
HE: 4.21

Steps:

1. make a curl request to get the asset details for "Aladdin (OV)" on PROD NL 

curl -X GET "http://vod-service.nl.ecx.lgi.io/v2/detailscreen/crid%3A~~2F~~2Fog.libertyglobal.com~~2F37500~~2FZINC_62289?language=en&profileId=dc49e9dc-61ac-4588-8fc4-935fb1c83dc8" -H "accept: application/json; charset=utf-8" -H "x-cus: 9770964_nl" -H "x-dev: 3C36E4-EOSSTB-003640699405"

2. check the duration in the response.

Expected Result:

Duration of the asset should be displayed (except for 0)

Actual Result:

Duration is displayed as 0.


Response: 
 

{
  "id": "crid:~~2F~~2Fog.libertyglobal.com~~2F37500~~2FZINC_62289",
  "type": "ASSET",
  "assetType": "REGULAR",
  "title": "Aladdin (OV)",
  "longSynopsis": "Disney brengt een sprankelende live-actionbewerking van de animatieklassieker Aladdin, het spannende verhaal over de innemende straatrat Aladdin, de moedige Prinses Jasmine en Geest, de niet te stuiten lampgeest die hun toekomst voorgoed zal veranderen. Regisseur Guy Ritchie werkte met een sterrencast bestaande uit onder meer Will Smith als de onstuitbare Geest, Mena Massoud als de innemende schelm Aladdin en Naomi Scott als Jasmine, de dappere, onafhankelijke prinses van Agrabah.",
  "isAdult": false,
  "ageRating": "9",
  "popularity": 404,
  "duration": 0,
  "bookmark": 0,
  "tvodEntitlementEnd": "2019-12-10T22:12:08.000Z",
  "onWatchlist": false,
  "genres": [
    "Film",
    "Adventure"
  ],
  "synopsis": "Disney’s live-actionbewerking van de klassieker. Aladdin is een straatrat die steelt om te overleven. Met behulp van een Geest uit een magische lamp probeert hij het hart van de prinses Jasmine te veroveren.",
  "audioLanguages": [
    "en"
  ],
  "country": [
    "US"
  ],
  "subtitles": [
    "nl"
  ],
  "icons": [
    "HD",
    "Dolby"
  ],
  "trailers": [
    "crid:~~2F~~2Fog.libertyglobal.com~~2F37500~~2FDZIA0000000000907835,imi:37500_DZIA0000000000907835-HEVC-1080p25-STB"
  ],
  "castAndCrew": [
    {
      "name": "Marwan Kenzari",
      "role": "Actor"
    },
    {
      "name": "Mena Massoud",
      "role": "Actor"
    },
    {
      "name": "Naomi Scott",
      "role": "Actor"
    },
    {
      "name": "Navid Negahban",
      "role": "Actor"
    },
    {
      "name": "Will Smith",
      "role": "Actor"
    },
    {
      "name": "Guy Ritchie",
      "role": "Director"
    }
  ],
  "instances": [
    {
      "id": "crid:~~2F~~2Fog.libertyglobal.com~~2F37500~~2FZINC_62289,imi:37500_CZIA0000000000907835-HEVC-1080p25-STB",
      "resolution": "HD",
      "isDolby": true,
      "audioLang": "en",
      "subtitles": "nl",
      "availabilityEnd": "2019-12-26T22:59:59.000Z",
      "offers": [
        {
          "id": "crid:~~2F~~2Fog.libertyglobal.com~~2F37500~~2FOG0_AZTA0000000000907835",
          "entitled": true,
          "offerId": "EEQMS2YZRC8Z2QQEHGQBSAH35EQNYWSA",

}

2. title: Fighting with My Family   crid-id: crid:~~2F~~2Fog.libertyglobal.com~~2F37500~~2FZINC_55501

fields.description:
1. Summary:
Json for focused tile in 'more like this' is missing. The response is an empty dictionary 

2. Severity:
Medium

3. Replication path/steps:

  1. Tune to any channel where 'more like this' is available.
  2. Open linear detail page (press 'OK')
  3. Press down and move focus on a tile in 'more like this'
  4. Send get request: http://<STB_IP>:8125/v2/nodes/focused where <STB_IP> is IP of you local STB


4. Actual results:
The response is an empty dictionary

5. Expected results:
Json for focused tile should be available

6. Frequency (percentage):
100%

7. SW version& HW Platform:
DCX960__-mon-ops-00.02-079-fm-AL-20191120070140-na004 8. Test environment: Prod NL, Prod CH, and Prod BE 9.

Additional Information:

 This issue is fixed as part of https://jira.lgi.io/browse/ARRISEOS-30660  which is for R4.23 SR86. And we are running automated test cases on PROD and Preprod tenants with SR79  build where all the test cases related to this are failing
fields.summary: [PROD] Missing JSON for focused tile in 'more like this'

fields.description:
Description :
The button "Browse all available channels" is not as per other tenants and it comes with a "."

Environment Details :
CPE BUILD: EOS1008C-mon-ops-00.02-076-fi-AL-20191007101917-na001
CPE VERSION: 076-fi
Reproducibility : Always
LAB : PROD
 

Scenario to reproduce :  
Precondition :  CPE should be up and running and box language should be English.  Box should have a custom profile with few channels added to personal line up.

  1. Launch TV Guide
  2. Press CONTEXT key.
  3. Validate the Pop up Button - Browse all available channels

Actual Result : Browse all available channels option is having a '.' at the end
Expected Result : Browse all available channels should be unique across all tenants
fields.summary: [AT PROD] 'Browse all available channels' option in TV Guide have an additional '.' at the end in AT tenant

fields.description:
Description :
While creating a profile, after selecting the personal line , the Genre Selection page is expected which is not currently available in AT tenant.


Environment details:
CPE BUILD: EOS1008C-mon-ops-00.02-076-fi-AL-20191007101917-na001
CPE VERSION: 076-fi
Reproducibility : Always
LAB : AT PROD

Scenarios to reproduce :
Precondition : CPE should be up and running and box language should be English. 

  1. Launch Profile Selection page. (Navigate to Menu -> Press UP)
  2. Select New icon.
  3. Select Profile color and type profile name.
  4. Skip the Personal Line up Selection page
  5. Validate the Genre Selection page

Actual Result : Genre Selection page is not displayed.
Expected Result : Genre Selection page should be displayed.

Note : Validated the Genre for the specific AT box and getting list of genres from BO (get available genres)
fields.summary: [AT PROD] Genre Selection page is not present while creating a profile in AT tenant.

Description of the issue:
==================

"Because you have watched" recommendation is missing for watched VOD assets 

Environment details:
=============== 
CH Prod
00.01-073-AV
Headend: 4.20


Scenario to reproduce:
=================
1) Launch VOD store,
2 ) Choose an asset which is not purchased yet 
3) Rent and Play the asset for a few minutes
4 )  Launch the VOD store again.
5) Naviagte to  Discover / Movies tab ,

 

Expected result:
============
User should be displayed with '*Because you have watched* 

Actual results:
===========

"Because you have watched" recommendation is missing

fields.description:
Description of the issue:
==================

For Few Recording assets End of Playout Is not setting Correct Bookmark

Environment details:
=============== 
CH/NL - PROD
00.01-070-AW
Headend: 4.19


Scenario to reproduce:
=================

1 ) Play a Very Recent recording which already has a bookmark set
2 ) Press ok and select continue watching
3 ) FF or Drag and Drop the playout to reach the end

 

 

Expected result:
============
After the end of the playout Detail page should show Watch Again or Play from the Beginning option

Actual results:
===========

After the end of the playout, Detail page Shows Watch and once ok is pressed continue watching and Play from start options are visible.

On Selecting Continue watching, asset is played from previous bookmark position.
fields.summary: [Prod/Preprod]For Few Recording assets End of Playout Is not setting Correct Bookmark
